name: Kindness.
description:
This is my first time participating in a game jam. As expected from me, this game is brimmed with flaws and bad execution. Still, I had fun while developing it and learned a lot as I did so. I wish you and your team the best of luck if you are also participating. 

You can send the link to your game in the comment and I’ll definitely check it out. Have a great day!
